records.QueryText: Information regarding Manganese deficiency in wheat ?
records.KccAns: For Manganese deficiency in wheat in light soil under rice- wheat rotation middle leaf become yellow in streak , spray Manganese Sulphate 1kg in 200 litres of water per acre 2-3 days before 1st irragation and 3afterwards weekly intervals on sunny days.  .

records.QueryType: Post Harvest Management (Cleaning, Grading, Packaging, Food Processing, Cool Chain etc.)
records.KccAns:
Wash the rhizomes thoroughly after harvest and heap them in a place for sweating.
Transfer this material after sweating to big jaggery boiling pans.
Pour water till rhizomes are covered with at least 5 cm (2 inches) water.
Cover rhizomes with dried turmeric leaves and cook them till rhizomes become soft.
Remove and dry in sun for 7 to 8 days. About 17 to 25 kg cured product can be get from 100 kg of raw turmeric.
Kisan bhai ap genhu ki fasal me NPK-18:18:18 @ 1.5 kilogram aur Sagarika @ 250 mili prati acre ki dar se 200 liter panee me ghol banakar chhidkaw kare

records.QueryText: Which fertilizer should be used in the litchi plant??
records.KccAns: kisan bhai aap apnai litchi ke paodhai me 900 gram urai, 1000 gram ssp, 250 gram mop khaadon ko gaay ke gale hue gobar ke saath, do bhaagon mein baantakar pahale bhaag ko monasoon mausam ke dauraan aur doosare bhaag ko monasoon ke baad daalen.

records.QueryText: Information  regarding control of broadleaf weeds in wheat ?
records.KccAns: For control of broadleaf weeds in wheat spray 250 g of 2,4 D sodium salt(80%) or 250 ml of 2,4 D ethyl ester (38%), Algrip 20WP 10g, Aim/Affinity 40DF 20g, Lanfida 50DF 20G in 150-200lt water per acre.
contact to block agriculture coordinator

records.KccAns: Recommended to spray 2.0 g. Mancozeb 50 WP.in a lit. water. 200 lit. spray solution/acre.
